###5.7
Call Graph View
Call Graph View helps you find time-consuming function calls, using a call graph.  
Select "Call Graph View" from the Views menu. 
This causes the functions calling "main" (the selected function) and those that "main" calls to appear.  Note their performance statistics. 
Click on the Butterfly button.
Click on the bottom right arrow to continue.
The Call Graph View window appears.  It's blank until you select data.

Usage View (Graphs)
Usage View (Numerical)
I/O View
Call Graph View
Leak View
Malloc View
Malloc Error View
Heap View
Call Stack
Working Set View
